description:
'''Andrew Gregory Sega''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|s|i:|g|ə}} {{respell|SEE|gə}}; born May 20, 1975), also known as '''Necros''', is an American musician best known for [[Music tracker|tracking]] [[module file|modules]] in the 1990s [[demoscene]] as well as for composing music for several well-known video games. He was a member of the synthpop duo [[Iris (American band)|Iris]] from 2001 until its disbandment in 2021. In 2020, he founded the [[dark wave]] duo Hallowed Hearts.

Sega is the owner of the [[independent record label]] Diffusion Records. His main solo project is known as The Alpha Conspiracy.
